mapper.select: SELECT S.USER_IDX, S.SHELTER_NAME, ST.NAME AS TYPE, S.SHELTER_PERSON_NAME, S.SHELTER_TEL, S.SHELTER_EMAIL, S.SHELTER_ZIP_CODE, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, S.SHELTER_BUSINESS_NUMBER, S.SHELTER_DESCRIPTION FROM SHELTERS S JOIN SHELTER_TYPES ST ON S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX = ST.IDX WHERE S.USER_IDX = #{userIdx};
